> Did you use bin/heritrix to start the app (If max is 64mb in console, 
> you probably didn't).  My top reportage on mem. usage and whats showing 
> in the UI seem to correlate.  Are you sure its the heritrix app that 
> showing using 28.8% of the heap?  The PIDs line up?  Which linux?  
> Kernel?  VM?
> Thanks,
> St.Ack
> 

I am using bin/heritrix and still getting  65088 KB max heap size in
the console. Started a crawl job and top shows 16.1 in %MEM column.
All java pids line up. There are 50 of those java running I guess! 1
for each toe thread? before starting the heritrix I did a ps -aef |
grep java to see if there is any java running, there was none. I am
running Gentoo linux, 2.6.7 kernel, sun-jdk-1.4.2.04. Any clue? 

-Nachi
